summary:
Winnie-the-Pooh is a beloved teddy bear character created by English author A. A. Milne and illustrator E. H. Shepard. The stories began in 1925 and were inspired by a real toy bear owned by Milne's son, Christopher Robin. The books, set in Hundred Acre Wood, include *Winnie-the-Pooh* (1926) and *The House at Pooh Corner* (1928).

Pooh has become a global icon, translated into many languages. Disney adapted the stories into popular animated films, introducing Pooh to new generations. The character's charm and simple adventures continue to capture the hearts of children and adults alike.
title: Winnie-the-Pooh
